DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test efficacy financial incentive augment telephone-delivered diabetes education skill train intervention improve HbA1c level African Americans ( AA ) type 2 diabetes ( T2DM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Financial Incentives Telephone Education Skills Trial African Americans With Diabetes ( FITEST )
DOC.detailed_description: African Americans T2DM high prevalence diabetes , poor metabolic control , great risk complication death compare White Americans . HbA1c primary marker glycemic control strong independent predictor development complication increase mortality T2DM . Key self-care behavior influence glycemic control ( HbA1c ) include diet , physical activity , self-monitoring blood glucose medication adherence . Systematic review multiple RCTs show self-care intervention include diabetes education skill train effective improve metabolic control diabetes . Recent finding indicate patient diabetes , especially ethnic minority patient , prefer telephone-delivered diabetes education group visit internet-based education . Multiple RCTs document effectiveness telephone-delivered self-care intervention T2DM . The overarch aim proposal test efficacy three financial incentive structure combination technology intensified diabetes education skill train intervention blood pressure quality life AAs T2DM . 60 AAs T2DM randomize three group vary frequency financial incentive : 1 ) High Frequency : financial incentive weekly uploads plus average glucose , incentive weekly attendance educational session , incentive end study meeting HbA1c goal 2 ) Moderate Frequency : financial incentive weekly uploads plus average glucose , incentive end study meeting HbA1c goal , 3 ) Low Frequency : financial incentive end study meeting HbA1c goal .
